project_abstract.cdata: The objectives of the Public Sector Modernization Technical Assistance Loan Project are to: (a) define new roles for the public sector; (b) strengthen operations for those entities that remain in the public sector; and (c) involve the private sector in the provision of public services. The project components include: (i) institutional restructuring and debureaucratization; (ii) human and financial resources management; (iii) privatization and private sector participation; and (iv) project coordination.
